```py
DataFrame.join(other, on=None, how='left', lsuffix='', rsuffix='', sort=False, validate=None)
```

```py
>>> other
 key   B

2  K2  B2
```

```py
>>> df.join(other, lsuffix='_caller', rsuffix='_other')

2         K2  A2        K2   B2
```

```py
key
```
